
       Name: Test case 3
Description: Test wrong http code and db output error
       File: testdata/errors-example/case3.yaml

Request:
     Method: GET
       Path: /json
      Query: 
       Body:
<no body>

Response:
     Status: 200 OK
       Body:
{"somefield":123}
       Db Request #1:
SELECT *
       Db Response #1:
{"field1":"value1"}
{"field2":123}


     Result: ERRORS!

Errors:

1) server responded with unexpected 'status':
     expected: 400
       actual: 200

2) path '$[0].field1': values do not match:
     expected: value2
       actual: value1

3) path '$[1].field2': values do not match:
     expected: 124
       actual: 123
